basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Solutions/Fortinet%20FortiNDR%20Cloud/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing. The [Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud](https://docs.fortinet.com/product/fortindr-cloud) solution for Microsoft Sentinel provides the capability to ingest Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud events into Microsoft Sentinel. For questions about Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud, please contact Fortinet at [fnc-sentinel@fortinet.com](mailto:fnc-sentinel@fortinet.com). **Data Connectors:** 1, **Parsers:** 1, **Workbooks:** 1 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud. You can get Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud custom log data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.

The Solution installs a parser that transforms the ingested data into Microsoft Sentinel normalized format. The normalized format enables better correlation of different types of data from different data sources to drive end-to-end outcomes seamlessly in security monitoring, hunting, incident investigation and response scenarios in Microsoft Sentinel.

options.text: This solution installs workbook(s) to help you gain insights into the telemetry collected in Microsoft Sentinel. After installing the solution, start using the workbook in Manage solution view.
Gain insights into Fortinet FortiNDR CLoud events, including the Suricata, Observation and Detections data.
